ath deka maruwen maruwata diga harina wita athe dabara agilla desa maruwen maruwata balima, meya da min pera awastha men itha semin, mandak wegawathwa ha wegawathwa washayen wara 10 bagin kala yuthuwe.ihatha sandahan kala wyayam krama hathara dinapatha kirimen obatath dipthimath ha nirogimath neth sagalak labagatha hakiyi.piripun denethata sambahanayaas yatata ath deke wedagili deka thaba as yata semin thada kirima ha lihil kirima.as wasa as yatata ath deke wedagili deka thaba wam pasa sita dakunu pasatath, dakunu pasa sita wam pasatath rawum aakarayata wara 10 bagin sambahanaya kirima.mema sambahana krama deka ude, sawasa kirimen aswala rudhira sansaranaya diyunu wi aswala malanika bawa duru wi as prabodhawath swabhawayakata pathwe.as wata kaluwimatakadala, mun ata, kawpi, elagi thel dama ranwan pata wanathek kabale bada kudukara ema kudu elakiri samaga mishrakota as wata aalepaya.amukkara kudu, walmi kudu, elakiri samaga mishrakota as wata aalepaya.arthapal, rabu elakiren thamba podikara aswata aalepaya.aamand kudu elakiri samanga mishrakota as wata aalepaya.melesa niwaradi wiharana rata anugamanaya kirimen obata himi samanya neth sangala dipthimath neth sagalak bawata pathwa muhunin amuthuma kanthiyak wihidewi.
lokaya mona kiwwath oya shariraya ohomma thiyan inna…
kese wethath me atharathura thawath konthrath ghathanayak halawathadi siduwiya.
rajya amathyansha sewakayan thana kihipayaka wen wela inne.

dan udula bandara awusadahami mahaththaya kiyana dewal, kapila piris mahaththayayi sanjiwa wijesinha mahaththayayi kiyana dewal, mita awurudu thihakata wira kalin agamathi ayiya – ee kiyanne mudiyanse thennakon mahaththaya; kiyapu dewal, ee wage ma suriya gunasekara mahaththaya kiyapu dewal piliwelakata ekathukarala pela poth tikak widihata sangrahakaranna apita bari ayi?

rajya anshaye karya mandala pilibanda 2017 warshaye awasan karthu warthawa mudal ha janamadhya amathya mangala samarawira mahatha wisin pasugiyada amathya mandalaya wetha idiripath karana lada awasthawedi amathya mandalaya wisin mema thirana walata elambaana ladi. 2017 wasara awasanaya wana wita samastha rajya anshaye rajaye amathyansha, departhamenthu, palath sabha ha palath palana aayathana menma rajya wyawasayayan sampurnayenma rajaya sathu aayathana ha rajya bankuwala pudgalayan 1,375,499 ku sewaya karana bawa gananaya kara thibe. 2017 wasara thula rajya sewa bandawa ganim 23,224 k sidukara atha.
emenma ehi adhyaksha mandalaya niyojanaya kala mano thiththawalla da siya illa aswime lipiya bhara di thibuna.

upathe sita wasara paha dakwa darupataw mema kanya sohoyuriyange sewane wesethi.pasugiya 22 wani dina sawasa lamarakshana adhikariye lama upakaraka durakathana sewa ankaya 1929 wetha labunu durakathana amathumak anuwa mema sthanaye daruwan wikinime jawaramak pawathwagena yana bawata thorathuru labini. 23 wani dinayedith ema durakathana ankayata ewanima durakathana amathumak labune me sthanaya pilibandawayi.
